segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the two children near the open cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is really going for it, trying to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a two-step stool, which looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out, almost like it's dancing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting backward, and he could fall at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see his hand already in the jar, grabbing a handful of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is eagerly waiting, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly part of this secret cookie heist operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their mission, it's almost admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about that stool; it looks like it's about to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, those cookies will scatter everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the noise might finally alert the oblivious woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, what a daring adventure they've embarked upon!
segments.speaker: PAR
